name: Rite Of Passage (Fabpk90)
description:
Help Flip & Flop to transition from peasant cats to king cats !

Slay the wave of enemies and share your victories with your buddy.

At the end of each wave, the winner choose which power up the other player will get.

This game may or may not have been inspired by my cats :)

HOW TO PLAY

Arrow keys to walk around

Left click to shoot

Aim with the mouse

DISCLAIMER : Programmer art inside !

Things i wish i could've done: 

  • Playtest sooner
  • Make a background music with my voice
  • Differentiate player 1 from player 2 (maybe another color ?)
  • More power ups
